ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations-measles/CodeSystem/IMMZConcepts
CodeDisplayDefinition
C.DE6MaleClient's biological sex is male
C.DE7FemaleClient's biological sex is female
C.DE8Biological sex not specifiedClient's biological sex is not specified
C.DE9IntersexClient's biological sex is intersex
